metadata.description: Spinally mediated trunk reflexes stabilizing vertebral alignment and abdominal wall tone.
metadata.notes: Entries emphasize reflex coordination unique to torso stabilization, excluding biomimetic actuator parameters.

abdominal.stimulus: Cutaneous stroking or sudden load across abdominal dermatomes.
abdominal.afferent: T7-T12 intercostal sensory fibers → dorsal horn.
abdominal.integration: Segmental interneurons recruiting ipsilateral abdominal musculature.
abdominal.efferent: Thoracoabdominal motor branches to external and internal obliques.
abdominal.effector: Localized abdominal wall contraction drawing the umbilicus toward stimulus.
abdominal.notes: Supports visceral shielding and posture adjustments.

gluteal.stimulus: Tactile input across sacral dermatomes or perturbation of pelvic tilt.
gluteal.afferent: Inferior gluteal cutaneous nerves → lumbosacral dorsal horn.
gluteal.integration: L4-S2 interneuron pools facilitating hip extensor activation.
gluteal.efferent: Inferior gluteal nerve to gluteus maximus fibers.
gluteal.effector: Brief hip extension and pelvic bracing.
gluteal.notes: Counters destabilizing forces during stance transitions.

postural_set.stimulus: Proprioceptive signals from paraspinal muscle stretch during trunk flexion.
postural_set.afferent: Muscle spindle feedback from erector spinae → dorsal horn.
postural_set.integration: Thoracolumbar propriospinal circuits balancing extensor tone.
postural_set.efferent: Lumbar motor neurons to paraspinal extensors.
postural_set.effector: Automatic correction of trunk orientation to upright alignment.
postural_set.notes: Maintains spinal alignment against gravity and load shifts.
